name: Luna Blanca
description:
Stranded on a hostile world, you have to fight strange alien lifeforms inhibiting this bizarre planet.

As you explore the area, you feel your equipment is not suited for the task, as not only your oxygen capacity expires rapidly but also your energy and ammunition are extremly limited. Luckily, the bodies of the creatures seem to provide a variety of useful materials, enabling you to craft enhancement for your equipment. 

However, an unknown force appears to hold your ship on the planet. Find its origin and get off this planet!

Music:

"Leaving Home" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Controls:

A/D: Move

Left Click: Shoot

Space: Jump

W: Enter Ship

Notes:

This Game saves your progress everytime you are near your ship, as soon as the restoring of your attributes starts. After entering your ship for upgrades, all lifeforms  respawn.
